newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-HAESSLER HOPES TO RETURN BEFORE END OF SEASON.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HAESSLER HOPES TO RETURN BEFORE END OF SEASON.

text.p: Experienced Germany midfielder Thomas Haessler, who broke his left leg in March, hopes to return to Bundesliga action for Karlsruhe before the end of the season.
Karlsruhe said on Thursday Haessler could be fit for the final two league games of the season against 1860 Munich and Freiburg in the second half of this month.
Haessler's season has been plagued by injury but he recently signed a contract to stay at Karlsruhe until 2000.
